Resource.item:
From this page you can send custom emails to invite users

Emails default templates are available. They can be saved, associated to the user and reused in other communities or questionnaires.
From the first panel you can manage templates. Select a template from the drop down menu, click “OK” to load it, or “Delete” to delete it. If you want to reset the template you are editing, click “New Template”.
To save a new template, you have to name it and then click “Save template as ” below the preview panel.

In the "Recipients" panel you can add users that will receive an invitation by email.

TAGS are available either for the email subject or for the email body but they must be manually added
Email body can be customed by clicking the available TAG buttons. Red texted buttons must be added to the email body.
All the tags so inserted, can be cutted and pasted in the subject line.

Currently available tags:
- Link (Tag: #LINKQUESTIONARIO#): redirects to the URL of the questionnaire. It is associated to the single invitation.
- Author (Tag: #AUTORE#): name and surname of the creator are added to the email.
- Destinatario (Tag: #DESTINATARIO#): name and surname of the recipient are added to the email.
- End date (Tag: #DATAFINE#): the end date of the questionnaire is specified in the email.
- Start date (Tag: #DATAINIZIO#): the start date of the questionnaire is specified in the email.
- Name of the questionnaire (Tag: #NOMEQUESTIONARIO#): the name of the questionnaire is specified in the email.
- Descrizione (Tag: #DESCRIZIONEQUESTIONARIO#): the descritpion is added to the email.
- Durata (Tag: #DURATA#): the duration of the questionnaire is specified in the mail.

In the preview panel it is possible to view the email, as the recipient will do. (except for the fields customed for every single user, like #DESTINATARIO# o #LINKQUESTIONARIO#).
